players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Diana: "Be careful, Alice might be onto me. Stay vigilant."
You: "I will stick to my investigation and keep an eye on Diana. Bob, can you provide any clues or alibis for yourself?"
Bob: "Bob is innocent. I have no alibi or clues to offer, but I assure you that I am not the mafioso or the detective."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
